#summary &iacute character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesI

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iacute

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cd/index.htm U+000CD].
  * `&Iacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cd/index.htm U+000CD].
  * `&iacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ed/index.htm U+000ED].
  * `&iacute` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ed/index.htm U+000ED].
